Zilles, K.; Bacha-Trams, M.; Palomero-Gallagher, N.; Amunts, K.; Friederici, A.D. (2015) Common molecular basis of the sentence comprehension network revealed by neurotransmitter receptor fingerprints. Cortex, vol 63, pp.79-89.

properties.description: The Jubrain cytoarchitectonic probabilistic maps were developed in the teams of Katrin Amunts and Karl Zilles in Juelich and Duesseldorf (INM-1). Cytoarchitectonic areas were analyzed in histological sections of ten human postmortem brains. The maps are based on image analysis and statistical criteria for localizing areal borders. Cytoarchitectonic maps have been developed during the past 20 years as a joint effort of many doctoral students, post docs and guest scientists. Maps, which have been published, are available for the scientific community.

publications.citation: Zilles, K., Amunts, K. 2010. Centenary of Brodmann's map--conception and fate. Nat Rev Neurosci. 11(2):139-45
